summary: Something awaits Tyler Jensen and his friends in the Hallettsville house. When Tyler's lifelong friends start dying, he must figure out a way to save himself, his girlfriend and the rest of the crew before the demons come.
cast: Gary Busey|Derek Lee Nixon|Logan Patrick Brown|Katie Fountain|Jordan Brower|Jesse Janzen|Brooke Baker|Karoly Bieganowski|GiGi Erneta|Aidan Marus|Sheila Bailey|Patrick Brown|Nick Cadena|Josh Chacona|Damon Chang|John Chilleri|Natalie Lauren Clark|Ellar Coltrane|Kevin Cox|Catherine Crowley|Kristen Noelle Devine|Zach Freeman|Liza Happel|Doran Ingram|Ayla Judson|Sheila Lucas|Philip Marlatt|Frank Matthews|Gill Montie|David Precopia|Flood Reed|Andrew Rice|Frank Salas Jr.|Michele Salem|Austin Tate|Taylor Weaver|Tom Weirich|Kate Elizabeth Young|Mac N Dixon|Timothy Massey|Stacey Storey|Andrea Trisdale
title: Hallettsville
